entries.title_d: One of our bomber squadrons have been ambushed on their way to the base and need your immediate assistance or they will perish!
entries.title: Dathomir system: Assist ambushed bomber squadron.
entries.quest_location_d: Even though we initially crippled the base defense of the Empire, they can still bite. There's several Imperial fighters still in the area and extreme caution is my advice.
entries.quest_helpallies_d: Assist our bombers in defeating the Imperial fighters trying to eliminate them.
entries.quest_findbattle_d: These are the coordinates the bomber squadron provided us with as a rendez-vous for any reinforcements we could send.
entries.found_loc: Uploading coordinates of our ambushed bomber squadron.
entries.enemies_win: Pull out pilot! Hopefully some of our other bomber squadrons have had better luck.
entries.enemies_remain: Tactical Computer: < Sensors show enemy target terminated. %DI enemy target(s) remain. >
entries.enemies_arrived: I'm getting reports of several advanced TIE ships in the enemy force, this will be rough.
entries.battle_started: May the force be with you my friends!
entries.allies_win: Excellent! B-Wing squadron Vicious, proceed as planned. Return to base pilot.
entries.allies_remain: Brother Extok Evin: < One of our bombers have fallen! Avenge him my friends! >
entries.allies_arrived: Hurry over there pilot, or there won't be anything left of our bombers!
